Name: Chronicles of Mystery: The Scorpio Ritual
About the game: Uncover the darkest secret of humanity! Young archeologist Sylvie Leroux accidentally stumbles upon an ancient secret. What she doesn't realize is that her research will put her in deadly peril. Who wants to prevent her from finishing her research? Are mere humans standing in her way, or is it a supernatural power? Dramatic story with many twists and turns Mystical atmosphere with breathtaking graphics Challenging and intense puzzles
